name: Global Conference on Engineering and Applied Science
content: Organized by Higher Education Forum (HEF), 2017 Global Conference on Engineering and Applied Science (GCEAS) is an international platform for scholars, researchers and practitioners to discuss interdisciplinary research and practices in the fields of engineering, applied science and more. 2017 GCEAS will take place from July 25-27, 2017 in Okinawa, Japan. Prospective authors are invited to submit original research abstracts or full papers which were not, are not and have not been submitted/published/under consideration in other conferences and journals. For more information, please visit: http://www.gceas-conf.org or contact: gceas@gceas-conf.org
